title: Week 17 Picks, Giants' Future, Black Monday Preview (Football 12/29)
description:
Nick Kostos, Pete Prisco, Will Brinson and Jason La Canfora are back for the final week of the regular season and their Week 17 picks against the spread. First, Nick, Pete and JLC discuss the Giants new GM hire Dave Gettleman, and the future of Odell Beckham, Eli Apple, Eli Manning and the head coaching position in New York. That's followed by a Black Monday preview.  Then, Jason issues his "Scandinavian Death Metal Lock of the Week." Nick and Pete then run through the Week 17 slate, adjusting their picks for injury reports and the whacky nature of the final Sunday. Then, Will hops on to share his best bets with the crew in what will be a photo finish in the SuperContest.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
